MS MCQs

    Virtualize memory - Two-level page mapping

    »

    1. Two-level page mapping, as employed by system memory virtualization, entails:

      Physical-to-real address translation

      Virtual-to-real address translation

      Real-to-physical address translation

      Virtual-to-real and then real-to-physical address translations

      Real-to-virtual address translation
